about:
Hi, Myself, I am Manikandan. I am from Idappadi in Salem district. I have completed BE Electronics and Communication Engineering, and then I have 2 years of I have experience in frontend development, and I am using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap5, JavaScript, React and Angular. Those technologies are used to build the web sites. 

 About My Goals: Short-term goals might include completing a project by a deadline, learning a new skill, or improving time management. Long-term goals could involve career advancement, financial stability, and starting a business. My hobbies are driving, playing cricket, and hearing songs.Â
